summary: This document is an email chain between FBI personnel discussing coordination for victim interviews related to the Epstein case. The emails show FBI victim specialists from Miami and New York arranging to assist with interviews scheduled in West Palm Beach, Florida on July 11, 2019.

persons.name: M.S.C.J.
persons.context: FBI Victim Specialist based in Miami who is coordinating to assist with Epstein victim interviews in West Palm Beach. They provide their contact information in the email signature.

persons.name: Jlperlewitz
persons.context: Email recipient mentioned in the initial 'To' field, appears to be an FBI email address (jlperlewitz@fbi.gov).

connections.description: Both appear to be FBI personnel communicating about coordinating victim services for the Epstein case.

events.title: Epstein victim interviews in West Palm Beach
events.description: FBI personnel coordinate to assist with interviews of Epstein victims scheduled at 11 AM and 3 PM in West Palm Beach, Florida.

events.title: Case Agent travels to Florida
events.description: The FBI Case Agent mentioned in earlier correspondence was traveling to Florida in preparation for victim interviews.

keyFacts: FBI victim specialists were actively coordinating to provide services to Epstein victims in July 2019.
Interviews with Epstein victims were scheduled for July 11, 2019 at 11 AM and 3 PM in West Palm Beach, Florida.
The FBI Case Agent traveled to Florida on July 10, 2019 in preparation for these interviews.
The email chain shows inter-office coordination between New York and Miami FBI personnel regarding victim assistance.
The document demonstrates ongoing investigative activity related to Epstein victims nearly a year before Epstein's death in August 2019.
